resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/81620</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>81620</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>9707</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The Weather 1 – Interactive Questioning</string>
            <string language="es">El tiempo 1 – Cuestionario interactivo</string>
            <string language="ga">An Aimsir 1 - Ceistiúchán Idirgníomhach</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das Wetter 1? Interaktives Ausfragen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Survivre à 1 ? Interrogation Interactive</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O Tempo 1? Questionar Interativo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Tempo 1? Interrogazione Interattiva</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ο καιρός 1; Διαλογική επερώτηση</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The pupils’ vocabulary will improve. Encourage the pupils’ interest in reading Irish through questioning. The pupils' vocabulary will increase. The pupils will become interested in reading Gaeilge through completing the quiz.</string>
            <string language="es">El vocabulario de los alumnos mejorará. Estimula el interés del alumno por la lectura en irlandés haciendo preguntas. Aumentará el vocabulario de los alumnos. Los alumnos se irán interesando en la lectura en irlandés cumplimentando el cuestionario.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tiocfaidh feabhas ar stór foclóra na ndaltaí.  Suim na ndaltaí a spreagadh i léitheoireacht  na Gaeilge trí ceistiúchán a dhéanamh.</string>
          </description>
          <language>ga</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Irish</string>
            <string language="es">Irlandés</string>
            <string language="ga">Gaeilge</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Pupillen? Wortschatz verbessert. 
Regen Sie die Pupillen an? Interesse auf Messwertiren 
durch das Ausfragen. Der Wortschatz der Pupillen erhöht sich. 
Die Schüler werden am Messwert Gaeilge durch das Durchführen 
des Quiz interessiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les pupilles ? le vocabulaire s'améliorera.
Encouragez les pupilles ? intérêt pour l'Irlandais de 
lecture par l'interrogation. Le vocabulaire des pupilles 
augmentera. Les élèves deviendront intéressés par la lecture
Gaeilge en terminant le jeu.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">As pupilas? o vocabulário melhorará. 
Incentive as pupilas? interesse no irish da leitura com 
questionar. O vocabulário das pupilas aumentará. Os 
alunos tornar-se-ão interessados na leitura Gaeilge com da 
terminação do quiz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Le pupille? il vocabolario migliorerà. 
Consigli alle pupille? interesse nell'Irlandese della 
lettura con interrogare. Il vocabolario delle pupille 
aumenterà. Gli allievi saranno interessati nella lettura 
Gaeilge through completando il quiz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι μαθητές; το λεξιλόγιο θα βελτιωθεί. 
Ενθαρρύνετε τους μαθητές; ενδιαφέρον για την ανάγνωση 
των ιρλανδικών μέσω της επερώτησης. Το λεξιλόγιο των 
μαθητών θα αυξηθεί. Οι μαθητές θα γίνουν ενδιαφερόμενοι 
στην ανάγνωση Gaeilge μέσω της ολοκλήρωσης του διαγωνισμοου 
γνώσεων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Irisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Irlandais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Irish</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Irlandese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιρλανδικά</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content on this site is protected by copyright under Irish and European law. All materials may be downloaded and copied for non-commercial purposes only, provided that the source is acknowledged. The reproduction of material for commercial purposes is strictly prohibited.

Material within the linked sites outside of Scoilnet may also have copyright restrictions and this should be checked on these websites should you plan to use their content in any way.</string>
